headline: Why Eli Lilly (LLY) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of global pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) fell 4.5% in the afternoon session after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) delayed its decision on the company's new oral weight-loss pill, Orforglipron. The regulator pushed its decision date to April 10 from a prior expectation of late-March.
